div.l: In pᵘurpos was to make here his eyr
Boþe of his catell ⁊and of his mesuage
And straunge he made hit of her mariage3980
His pᵘurpos was to be stowe her͗e hye
In to some worþi blod of Auncetrie
For holy chyrche gode mot be despended
On holy chirche blod þᵗat is descended
Þ̉erfore he wolde his holy blod honoure3985
Þauh þᵗat he sholde holy chyrche deuoure
Grete soken hath þis myller oute of doute
Wᵗith whete ⁊and malt of all þᵉ lond aboute
And namely þ̉er was a grete colage
Men clepe þᵉ solers halle of Cambrugge3990
Þ̉er was hure whete ⁊and hure malt grounde
And on a day hit happed in astound
Seek lay þᵉ maunciple on a maladie
Men wende wysly þᵗat he sholde dye
For soþe þᵉ myller stall boþe mele ⁊and corn3995
Anhundred tyme more þan he dude biforn
For þ̉er before he stale but curteysly
But now he was a þef outragiously
For þᵉ whyche þᵉ wardeyn chid ⁊and made fare
But þ̉erof set þᵉ myller not a tare
He craked bost ⁊and swore hit was no
Þ̉ere were þan ȝonge pore scoleres to
Þat dwelled in þᵉ halle of wych I sey
Testyf þei were ⁊and lusty forte pley
And only for her myrthes ⁊and her reuelrie4005
Vpon þᵉ wardeyn bisily þei crie
To ȝeue hem leue but a lytel stounde4007
